title: Loading screen banners look off....
body:
There's not much to say.. other than the champion mastery banners look like they're placed too far to the left of the screen
(Look screenshot)

replies.body:
Hey I Nom Yo Mom,

Thanks for the report! I'll catch up with the team who handles this feature!
There is that.  Also, you now don't see the enemy teams rank or mastery - which seems odd.  Wonder why that was changed.
You didn't get to see the enemy ranks and mastery before either. You only see them both when spectating.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Esdn3zIA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-19T06:56:56.348+0000)
>
> You didn't get to see the enemy ranks and mastery before either. You only see them both when spectating.

Yes, you did.  They used to show up on the loading screen.  This wasn't only a spectating feature.  Until this last patch or two, it used to show regularly on my loading screens.  Didn't screen image it as it was a regular thing.

Sorry, but you're mistaken.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h2q3

https://i.gyazo.com/4ad6c039908f2f9534b240446dc076fe.png
https://i.gyazo.com/0f282ef238d8be819b25b94a77c89b3b.png
https://i.gyazo.com/c2a0f11d2a86548bed62d0017ad2e197.png

I took the liberty of screenshotting imaqtpie and goodguygarry recordings from Nov. 20th so there's no mistake, and one I happened to have in my own recording.
Don't care about your recordings.  I was telling you what I saw on my account and that it didn't happen any longer.  But downvote away.  It doesn't change anything.

> Don't care about your recordings

I had to give you the benefit of the doubt and assume that hard evidence meant something to you. My mistake.
I've been playing since season 3 and have never once seen the enemy teams border.

I imagined seeing them too when I started playing season 3 lol. People told me the same thing and sadly they were right... You were never able to see enemy borders. You can see enemy champion mastery in game if it's level 5 however.
prob to make it where the jungle does not just camp a certain lane :P
I don't know what you were doing, but they didn't. Not for several SEASONS.
